name: MotivationalStoriesEveryday
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The motivational story is a podcast that will give random motivational stories every day. It may contain various stories of big billionaires and also stories of persons who have acheived something. It will help people being motivated.
Disclaimer: This skill does not gurantees that you will be motivated. If you find any problem with this skill kindly mail us and we will be happy to help.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
